meaningMnemonic: If you're in Japan, the <radical>fish</radical> in your <radical>village</radical> are <kanji>carp</kanji>. You may know them as <kanji>koi</kanji>, too.
readingMnemonic: A <kanji>carp</kanji> is called a <reading>koi</reading> (こい) in Japanese. We've used that word before so I hope you know it by now. A koi is a koi, you know?
